summary: All three requirements (REQ-13, REQ-14, REQ-15) are substantially implemented. The diff shows a new DemoBookingSection component with all required fields and validation, backend main.mo with DemoRequest type and both methods, and the useSubmitDemoRequest hook in useQueries.ts. Minor observations: REQ-14 requires validation that name is non-empty in addition to email, but the backend only validates email format. All other acceptance criteria appear met.

missing_requirements.requirement: `submitDemoRequest` validates that name is non-empty in addition to email before storing the record.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend main.mo only calls validateEmail (checks for '@' and '.'), but does not explicitly validate that the name field is non-empty. The AC states both email and name must be validated.

hallucinated_features.description: A getAllDemoRequestsByEmail query method was added to the backend actor, filtering requests by email address.
hallucinated_features.reason: This method was not requested in any requirement or acceptance criterion. It is additional unrequested functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: A migration module (backend/migration.mo) was added to handle schema migration from old actor state.
hallucinated_features.reason: No migration requirement was specified in the build request. This is additional infrastructure not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: The useCaptureEmail hook was refactored to internally call submitDemoRequest with placeholder values instead of a dedicated captureEmail backend method.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request did not ask for changes to the existing useCaptureEmail hook or its underlying backend call. This is a modification to existing functionality not requested.
